metadata.name: Drifter
metadata.description:
Coral is on the run, again. But who can catch a changer—a girl who can be anything?

Home at last and loaded with contraband, Coral reunites with Elias, an old flame, now the Academy’s youngest surgeon.

But Coral’s perfect night is ruined when Rahu, a fanatical killer, tracks her down and tricks her into unleashing a vindictive goddess.

With her world threatened, Coral turns to Cyrus, a battle poet sworn to protect the multiverse. But learning dangerous magic takes time, and Rahu is out for blood.
